title: Chandra Prakash Shukla
text:
Chandra Prakash Shukla (born 5 July 1968) is an Indian politician and a member of <a href="17th%20Legislative%20Assembly%20of%20Uttar%20Pradesh">17th Legislative Assembly of Uttar Pradesh</a> of <a href="India">India</a>. He represents the <a href="Kaptanganj%20%28Assembly%20constituency%29">Kaptanganj constituency</a> of Uttar Pradesh and is a member of the <a href="Bharatiya%20Janata%20Party">Bharatiya Janata Party</a>.
Early life and education.
Shukla was born 5 July 1968 in <a href="Basti%20district">Basti district</a> of <a href="Uttar%20Pradesh">Uttar Pradesh</a> to father Arjun Prasad Shukla. In 23 May 1986, he married Asha Shukla, with whom he has two daughters. He graduated as a Charted Accountant from <a href="Institute%20of%20Chartered%20Accountants%20of%20India">Institute of Chartered Accountants of India</a>, <a href="New%20Delhi">New Delhi</a> in 1999. Apart from being a chartered accountant, he is the chairman of "Timecity Group".
Political career.
Shukla has been a member of the 17th Legislative Assembly of <a href="Uttar%20Pradesh">Uttar Pradesh</a>. Since 2017, he has represented the <a href="Kaptanganj%20%28Assembly%20constituency%29">Kaptanganj constituency</a> and is a member of the BJP. In <a href="Seventeenth%20Legislative%20Assembly%20of%20Uttar%20Pradesh">2017 elections</a>, he defeated <a href="Bahujan%20Samaj%20Party">Bahujan Samaj Party</a> candidate <a href="Ram%20Prasad%20Chaudhary">Ram Prasad Chaudhary</a> by a margin of 6,827 votes.
